title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       The overall management of Minuteman Missile National Historic Site is the responsibility of the superintendent. Park staff is divided into four divisions or disciplines:  Park Management and Administration Encompasses activities related to park-wide administrative, managerial, and support functions, as well as safety and planning. In addition, this area responsible for working with external constituencies in order to develop valuable park partnerships. Altogether, the Management and Administration staff provides a host of essential services to enable park employees to focus on accomplishing core mission operations and their functional duties. Superintendent                - Eric Leonard  Administrative Assistant - Jeanne Berry  Interpretation & Education The Division of Interpretation and Education conducts a variety of interpretive programs and outreach to encourage the development of a deeper understanding of American history and to broaden public support for preserving park resources. Interpretive rangers present the story of the role Minuteman Missiles played in America's policy of strategic nuclear deterrence during the Cold War to visitors through formal interpretation at the park with talks, special events, and with informal interpretation. Chief of Interpretation & Resource Education - Joe Brehm Park Ranger                              - Vacant    Facility Management The Maintenance functional area encompasses all activities designed to improve or prolong the life of the park's assets. The preservation of these resources allows for visitors to safely enjoy their activities at Minuteman Missile.  Facility Operations Specialist - Vacant Resource Management The Cultural Resource staff protect the legacy of the Minuteman Missile weapons systems role in the Cold War through care of museum collections, oral history materials and through resource management monitoring. Cultural resource management at Minuteman Missile encompasses activities related to the management, preservation, and protection of a variety of natural communities and processes, cultural landscapes, museum artifacts, and archaeological sites.  Park Curator    - Megan Cherry
